cows.name: Eleanor
cows.description: Eleanor is a calm, gentle Highland cow with a rich rust-colored coat. She enjoys quiet mornings grazing on misty hillsides and is often the first to greet visitors.

cows.name: Oliver
cows.description: Oliver’s long silver-blonde fur makes him look like he’s glowing in the morning fog. Playful and social, he’s known for following the farmer around the pasture.

cows.name: Margaret
cows.description: Margaret has deep chestnut fur and a wise, steady gaze. She’s the matriarch of her herd, guiding younger cows with patience and an unspoken authority.

cows.name: Caleb
cows.description: Caleb is a spirited young Highland cow with a soft golden coat and endless energy. He’s always trotting around, chasing birds or splashing through puddles after the rain.

cows.name: Rosalind
cows.description: Rosalind is one of the oldest cows in the meadow. Her deep mahogany fur has faded slightly with age, but she carries herself with grace and wisdom.

cows.name: Duncan
cows.description: Duncan’s reddish-amber coat glows like fire at sunset. He’s brave, dependable, and always keeps a close eye on the herd when storms roll over the mountains.

cows.name: Clara
cows.description: Clara is a young, curly-furred Highland cow with a mischievous streak. She loves exploring beyond the fence and has a knack for finding the tastiest clumps of grass.

cows.name: Simon
cows.description: Simon’s ash-gray coat and calm personality make him blend perfectly into the misty Highlands. He’s often seen standing quietly by the loch, lost in thought.
